Package simpleGUI.media

Class PictureViewer

java.lang.Object
simpleGUI.media.PictureViewer
public class PictureViewer extends Object
A picture viewer that can be attached to a Frame.

  • Constructor Details

    • PictureViewer

      public PictureViewer()
      Constructor. Create an empty PictureViewer that is not connected to an owner frame, and do not have a size.

    • PictureViewer

      public PictureViewer(Frame owner, String source)
      Constructor. Setting the height to 300px and width to 500px by default.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Frame that hold the PictureViewer.
      source - The filepath to the source file.

    • PictureViewer

      public PictureViewer(Frame owner, String source, int heightInPixels, int widthInPixels)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Frame that hold the PictureViewer.
      source - The filepath to the source file.
      heightInPixels - The height of the PictureViewer in pixels.
      widthInPixels - The width of the PictureViewer in pixels.
